content.text:
# Plasticity (software)

| latest release version =
| latest release date =
| operating system = Windows, macOS (Intel & M Series), Linux, Ubuntu
| platform =
| genre = CAD software
| license = Proprietary
| website =
}}
Plasticity is a 3D computer graphics software program that runs on Windows, MacOS, and Linux. It runs on Parasolid's geometric modeling kernel. It is pitched as CAD for artists.
Features
* Non-uniform rational B-spline
* Solid modeling
* Polygon mesh modeling
* Boolean operations
* Real-time rendering
* SpaceMouse support
* Blender Bridge - Real-time sync between Plasticity and Blender
